@ａｄｓａｒｅｂａｄｃｉｖｉｌｉｚａｔｉｏｎ, sadly I don't remember the name it was a short manga, some 15 to 20 chapters, I read like 5 years ago, but I  remember enough details to maybe find it; the protagonists were two chilhood friends the girl gets possesed by a fox spirit / deity, while she is being controlled by the spirit she transforms in the usual way of those entities, she gets fox ears, the hair changes colors and gets numerous fox tails  with the particularity that each tail had a sword in it; the male protagonist makes a deal with the spirit and helps her fight other demons and a cult of occultists named Tachikawa Ryuu; while I was reading it some of the other readers mentioned that the art was made by a hentai artist which makes sense since the spirit-possesed girl seemed to experience pleasure while fighting and sometimes her face resembled an ahegao, the name of the artist was sigma something and according to the readers made hardcore H stuff, if I find the name I'll let you know.
